entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 2:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
